BRADLEY_ABOUT:
<color=#ff3b3b>Bradley Control {Version}</color>: by <color=green>mattparks</color>. Bradley Control is a plugin that controls Bradley properties. Use the /bradley command as follows: 
 <color=#1586db>•</color> /bradley - Displays Bradley Control about and help. 
 <color=#1586db>•</color> /bradley reset - Resets the Bradley in the area. 
 <color=#1586db>•</color> /bradley clearGibs - Clears all Bradley gibs/parts. 
 <color=#1586db>•</color> /bradley clearFire - Clears all Bradley fire. 
 <color=#1586db>•</color> /bradley clearCrates - Clears all Bradley crates. 
 <color=#1586db>•</color> /bradley unlockCrates - Unlocks all Bradley crates. 
 <color=#1586db>•</color> /bradley clearAll - Clears all Bradley stuff.
BRADLEY_REMOVE_ALL: <color=#ff3b3b>Removing all Bradleys, parts, fires, and crates!</color>
